patched_yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: buildkitd
spec:
  containers:
  - name: buildkitd
    image: moby/buildkit:master
    readinessProbe:
      exec:
        command:
        - buildctl
        - debug
        - workers
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 30
    livenessProbe:
      exec:
        command:
        - buildctl
        - debug
        - workers
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 30
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: buildkitd
spec:
  containers:
  - name: buildkitd
    image: moby/buildkit:master
    readinessProbe:
      exec:
        command:
        - buildctl
        - debug
        - workers
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 30
    livenessProbe:
      exec:
        command:
        - buildctl
        - debug
        - workers
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 30
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
      runAsNonRoot: true
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW

        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: buildkitd
spec:
  containers:
  - name: buildkitd
    image: moby/buildkit:master
    readinessProbe:
      exec:
        command:
        - buildctl
        - debug
        - workers
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 30
    livenessProbe:
      exec:
        command:
        - buildctl
        - debug
        - workers
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 30
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-test
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql-test
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql-test
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: key
                operator: In
                values:
                - value
      containers:
      - name: mysql-test
        image: statemood/mysql:5.7.21
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_CONFIG_FILE
          value: /var/lib/mysql/my.cnf
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: ''
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: data
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 900m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 900m
            memory: 2Gi
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 20
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 20
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: data-mysql-test

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-test
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql-test
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql-test
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: key
                operator: In
                values:
                - value
      containers:
      - name: mysql-test
        image: statemood/mysql:5.7.21
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_CONFIG_FILE
          value: /var/lib/mysql/my.cnf
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: ''
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: data
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 900m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 900m
            memory: 2Gi
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 20
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 20
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: data-mysql-test

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: echo-client
  labels:
    app: echo-client
    group: sample
    version: 0.0.1
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: echo-client
      group: sample
      version: 0.0.1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: echo-client
        group: sample
        version: 0.0.1
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: echo-client
        image: echo-client:stable
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        ports:
        - name: http
          containerPort: 7001
        - name: http-metrics
          containerPort: 7090
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /live
            port: 7090
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 3
          successThreshold: 1
          failureThreshold: 3
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 7090
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 3
          successThreshold: 1
          failureThreshold: 3
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: cassandra-stress-normal
  labels:
    app: cassandra-stress
spec:
  volumes:
  - name: cassandra-stress-profile-volume
    configMap:
      name: cassandra-stress-normal
  securityContext:
    fsGroup: 1
    runAsNonRoot: true
    runAsUser: 1006
    supplementalGroups:
    - 1
  containers:
  - name: cassie1-cassandra-stress
    image: cassandra:stable
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - IPC_LOCK
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      privileged: false
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
    command:
    - /bin/sh
    args:
    - -c
    - cassandra-stress 'user profile=/opt/cassandra-stress/normal_stress.yaml ops(insert=10,query_by_sub_id=8)
      duration=120m cl=one -node cassandra-demo -mode native cql3 user=bench password=monbench
      -rate threads=30 -pop seq=0..100M -tokenrange -graph file=/tmp/stress-normal.html'
      && echo END && while true ; do sleep 60; done
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: '3'
        memory: 8Gi
      requests:
        cpu: '3'
        memory: 8Gi
    volumeMounts:
    - name: cassandra-stress-profile-volume
      mountPath: /opt/cassandra-stress

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: cassandra-stress-normal
  labels:
    app: cassandra-stress
spec:
  volumes:
  - name: cassandra-stress-profile-volume
    configMap:
      name: cassandra-stress-normal
  securityContext:
    fsGroup: 1
    runAsNonRoot: true
    runAsUser: 1006
    supplementalGroups:
    - 1
  containers:
  - name: cassie1-cassandra-stress
    image: cassandra:stable
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - IPC_LOCK
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      privileged: false
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
    command:
    - /bin/sh
    args:
    - -c
    - cassandra-stress 'user profile=/opt/cassandra-stress/normal_stress.yaml ops(insert=10,query_by_sub_id=8)
      duration=120m cl=one -node cassandra-demo -mode native cql3 user=bench password=monbench
      -rate threads=30 -pop seq=0..100M -tokenrange -graph file=/tmp/stress-normal.html'
      && echo END && while true ; do sleep 60; done
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: '3'
        memory: 8Gi
      requests:
        cpu: '3'
        memory: 8Gi
    volumeMounts:
    - name: cassandra-stress-profile-volume
      mountPath: /opt/cassandra-stress

errors: environment variable NEO4J_PASSWORD must use secretKeyRef
environment variable JWT_SECRET must use secretKeyRef
environment variable AGENTS_JWT_SECRET must use secretKeyRef
environment variable NEO4J_PASSWORD must use secretKeyRef
environment variable JWT_SECRET must use secretKeyRef
environment variable AGENTS_JWT_SECRET must use secretKeyRef

patched_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: imicros-users-deployment
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: imicros-users
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: imicros-users
        version: '0.1'
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: imicros-users
        image: al66/imicros-backend:stable
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: SERVICES
          value: master, user, groups, agents, acl
        - name: MASTER_TOKEN
          value: zuf+tfteSlswRu7BJ86wekitnifILbZam1KYY3TG
        - name: SERVICE_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: service-token
              key: token
        - name: TRANSPORTER_NATS
          value: nats://nats:4222
        - name: CASSANDRA_CONTACTPOINTS
          value: cassandra
        - name: CASSANDRA_DATACENTER
          value: datacenter1
        - name: CASSANDRA_KEYSPACE_KEYS
          value: imicros_keys
        - name: CASSANDRA_PORT
          value: '9042'
        - name: CASSANDRA_USER
          value: cassandra
        - name: CASSANDRA_PASSWORD
          value: cassandra
        - name: NEO4J_URI
          value: bolt://neo4j:7687
        - name: NEO4J_USER
          value: neo4j
        - name: NEO4J_PASSWORD
          value: neo4j
        - name: JWT_SECRET
          value: zuf+tfteSlswRu7BJ86wekitnifILbZam1KYY3TG
        - name: AGENTS_JWT_SECRET
          value: my JWT secret - should be set as a Kubernetes secret
        - name: EVENT_OWNER_ID
          value: 096f1dff-681a-4746-b5cd-2228f69630c7
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
